thread.title: About 100 foreign students allegedly lose up to $1 million to Brisbane-based education agency
thread.title_full: About 100 foreign students allegedly lose up to $1 million to Brisbane-based education agency

title: About 100 foreign students allegedly lose up to $1 million to Brisbane-based education agency
text: | MP3 download About 100 young foreigners have allegedly lost up to one million dollars to a Brisbane-based international education agency.The aspiring students paid the agency to arrange tuition and accommodation, but both the money and the agent have disappeared.All the clients were from developing countries and for some - the money represented their life savings.Featured:Gabrielle Pinha, Tu Futoro client Valmor Morais, Honorary Brazilian Consul in BrisbanePhil Honeywood, International Education Association of Australia
